titleStmt.title: France painted to the life by a learned and impartial hand.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Peter Heylyn. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).

Unauthorized ed. of the first part of: A full relation of two journeys, the one into the main-land of France, the other into some of the adjacent ilands. London, 1656; and, A survey of the estate of France, and some of the adjoyning ilands. London, 1656.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
